Series III: Photojournalism and Documentary Photography
Ari and Helene Bousbib collection of photographs
Ari and Helene Bousbib collection of photographs

This subseries contains photographs by Margaret Bourke-White (1904â€”1971), an American photographer known for her extensive contributions to photojournalism, particularly for her Life magazine work. She is recognized as having been the first female documentary photographer to be accredited by and work with the U.S armed forces.
This subseries consists of photos that capture the action centered around a single park bench during the course of one day. These images were published in Look Magazine on April 30, 1946.
